trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of resource provider factory for design time.
trans-unit.target: 指定設計階段的資源提供者 Factory 型別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Compilation.DesignTimeResourceProviderFactoryAttribute> class allows a <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory> object to specify the type of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeResourceProviderFactory> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Compilation.DesignTimeResourceProviderFactoryAttribute>類別可讓<xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory>物件指定的型別相關聯的<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeResourceProviderFactory>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeResourceProviderFactory> class is used to create design-time providers for reading and writing resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeResourceProviderFactory>類別用來建立設計階段提供者進行讀取和寫入資源。

trans-unit.source: Within [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)], a developer can use the **Generate Local Resource** command on the **Tools** menu to create resources during design time.
trans-unit.target: 內[!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)]，開發人員可以使用**產生本機資源**命令**工具**功能表，在設計階段期間建立的資源。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a customized resource provider factory that specifies a customized design-time resource provider factory through the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.DesignTimeResourceProviderFactoryAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範自訂的資源提供者處理站，指定自訂的設計階段資源提供者 factory 透過<xref:System.Web.Compilation.DesignTimeResourceProviderFactoryAttribute>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This example does not include the code necessary to implement a customized design-time resource provider factory.
trans-unit.target: 此範例不包含實作的自訂的設計階段資源提供者處理站所需的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.DesignTimeResourceProviderFactoryAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.DesignTimeResourceProviderFactoryAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The name of the resource provider factory type.
trans-unit.target: 資源提供者 Factory 型別的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.DesignTimeResourceProviderFactoryAttribute" /> class with the attribute set to the specified factory type name.
trans-unit.target: 使用設定為指定 Factory 型別名稱的屬性，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.DesignTimeResourceProviderFactoryAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The type of the resource provider factory.
trans-unit.target: 資源提供者 Factory 的型別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.DesignTimeResourceProviderFactoryAttribute" /> class with the attribute set to the qualified name of the specified factory type.
trans-unit.target: 使用設定為指定 Factory 型別之限定名稱 (Qualified Name) 的屬性，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.DesignTimeResourceProviderFactoryAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Compilation.DesignTimeResourceProviderFactoryAttribute.FactoryTypeName%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName%2A> property value of the `factoryType` parameter.
Gets the value of the factory type name.
trans-unit.target: 取得 Factory 型別名稱的值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the name of the factory type.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含 Factory 型別的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the default provider is used.
trans-unit.target: 判斷是否使用預設提供者。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.DesignTimeResourceProviderFactoryAttribute.FactoryTypeName" /> equals <see langword="null" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.DesignTimeResourceProviderFactoryAttribute.FactoryTypeName" /> 等於 <see langword="null" /> 則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。
